name: 當代藝術
goals: To impart in-depth knowledge of contemporary art to students
To analyze and understand the latest development, theoretical issues and debates in contemporary creation
To cultivate student’s abilities to observe, understand, compare and interpret works of art
To shape student’s abilities to question and solve issues related to the latest development of art. To encourage their critical thinking
To train students to collect, study, and analyze primary and secondary sources, to select and comment the literature related to contemporary art
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
